td.br:
Dear Parent(s)/Guardian(s)
Kindergarten Round Up, which was scheduled on April 7th will be postponed until a later date. The date will be determined once we have a chance to reevaluate different factors.
Sincerely,
David J. Mantzke
Principal
ICES

Dear Parent(s)/Guardian(s),
The Indian School District is in the second year of e-Learning. During the origination of our e-plan, our focus was on providing e-Learning for school closings due to extreme weather or other unexpected events that were short term in nature. Our focus did not anticipate this “unprecedented event” nor did we anticipate the possibility of e-Learning for the remainder of the school year, which is a strong possibility. Originally, the e-Learning focus was on review. Now we need to plan for new teaching and differentiating instruction and/or assessments. ISBE guidance states that e-Learning should not negatively affect a student's grades in PK-12th during this transition period (3/16-3/20 & 3/30). Keep in mind that learning is progressive. It is in the best interest of the student to keep up with the school work now so they understand future school work. Create a plan or routine to stay on track. Students need to be prepared for the next step in their educational future and grades should not negatively affect their summative grade. Everyday we are receiving updated information and we will continue to send you updates. See the attached letter.

After much thought and deliberation, Indian Creek Elementary has made the decision to postpone our Grand Parents/Grand Persons Day. This decision is made as a precautionary measure for all of those that are involved in this special day. This event is very important to all that are involved and we will look to try and reschedule Grand Parents/Grand Persons Day at a later date. The date will be determined once we have a chance to reevaluate different factors.
Sincerely,
David J. Mantzke
Principal
Indian Creek Elementary
Please find attached information of upcoming events for the Winter of 2020.
Kishwaukee United Way is pleased to share our seventh formal update for the 2-1-1 phone & internet information and referral service for the second quarter of 2019, April through June.
Please see the attachment for a printable version on district letterhead.

Online Registration is Open for 2019-2020 School Year. To register online, please use the QUICK LINKS tab on the district website. They have been updated and are working much better! Our website is indiancreekschools.org
